Description: In case of measurements of more than 36 degrees (C) of both temperature sensors; reduce CPSs temperatures by 10 degrees (C).
In case of measurements of both temperature sensors that lie more than 25 degrees (C) apart; clean filters.
In case of water evaporation for longer than an hour; add 1l of cool water.
In case of water measurements that jump by more than 10 liters within one minute; replace gears.
